verses.text: And it came to pass, when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had given him \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* from all his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*;

That the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w* now, I \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*, but the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w*.

And \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all that \add is\add* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with thee.

¶ And it came to pass that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, that the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Shalt thou \w build|strong="H1129"\w* me an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for me to dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w*?\f + \fr 7.5 \ft my servant…: Heb. to my servant, to David\f*

Whereas I have not \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \add any\add* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* since the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that I brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, even to this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, but have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in a \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* and in a \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

In all \add the places\add* wherein I have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* with all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* I a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* with \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Why \w build|strong="H1129"\w* ye not me an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*?\f + \fr 7.7 \ft any of…: any of the judges\f*

Now therefore so shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, I \w took|strong="H3947"\w* thee from the \w sheepcote|strong="H5116"\w*, from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, to be \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:\f + \fr 7.8 \ft from following: Heb. from after\f*

And I was with thee whithersoever thou \w wentest|strong="H1980"\w*, and have cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* out of thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, and have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, like unto the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add men\add* that \add are\add* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft out of…: Heb. from thy face\f*

Moreover I will \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* for my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and will \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* them, that they may \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in a place of their own, and \w move|strong="H7264"\w* no more; neither shall the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H5766"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* them any \w more|strong="H3254"\w*, as \w beforetime|strong="H7223"\w*,

And as since the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \add to be\add* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and have caused thee to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* from all thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*. Also the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w telleth|strong="H5046"\w* thee that he will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And when thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* be \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*, and thou shalt \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* with thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, I will set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, which shall \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* out of thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*, and I will \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* his \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.

He shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and I will \w stablish|strong="H3559"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of his \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

I will be his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and he shall be my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. If he commit \w iniquity|strong="H5753"\w*, I will \w chasten|strong="H3198"\w* him with the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and with the \w stripes|strong="H5061"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*:

But my \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* shall not depart \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from him, as I \w took|strong="H5493"\w* \add it\add* from \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, whom I put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

And thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and thy \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H0539"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

According to all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and according to all this \w vision|strong="H2384"\w*, so did \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

¶ Then \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add am\add* I, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*? and what \add is\add* my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that thou hast \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me \w hitherto|strong="H1988"\w*?

And this was yet a small \w thing|strong="H6994"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; but thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* also of thy \w servant’s|strong="H5650"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for a great while to \w come|strong="H7350"\w*. And \add is\add* this the \w manner|strong="H8452"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*?  +  r 7.19  t manner: Heb. law *

And what \w can|strong="H3254"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* unto thee? for thou, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.

For thy \w word’s|strong="H1697"\w* sake, and according to thine own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all these great \w things|strong="H1420"\w*, to make thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add them\add*.

Wherefore thou art \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for \add there is\add* none like thee, neither \add is there any\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w beside|strong="H2108"\w* thee, according to all that we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* with our \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

And what \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* like thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* like \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whom \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* for a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to himself, and to \w make|strong="H7760"\w* him a \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for you great \w things|strong="H1420"\w* and \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w*, for thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which thou \w redeemedst|strong="H6299"\w* to thee from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add from\add* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* and their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*?

For thou hast \w confirmed|strong="H3559"\w* to thyself thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add to be\add* a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto thee \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, art \w become|strong="H1961"\w* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And now, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* concerning thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and concerning his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* \add it\add* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as thou hast \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

And let thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* be \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \add is\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and let the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

For thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, hast \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w* to thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thee an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: therefore hath thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* this \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 7.27 \ft revealed: Heb. opened the ear\f*

And now, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, thou \add art\add* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* be \w true|strong="H0571"\w*, and thou hast \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* this \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*:

Therefore now let it \w please|strong="H2974"\w* thee to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, that it may continue for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: for thou, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it:\add* and with thy \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* let the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 7.29 \ft let it…: Heb. be thou pleased and bless\f*
